text:
I had, but then got a warning about some email providers not rendering Media queries.

I have managed to get it to stack now but im failing to `align=center` in Mobile
Can you try enable the <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/email/create-programmable-emails|programmable email beta> for this module?

Enabling programmable works with API single email?
<https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/email/transactional_email/single-send-overview>

When I enable this, I get a temaplte error with function `buildStyles`
> 'Could not resolve function 'buildStyles''
Could you open a ticket via support and ask them to tag me so I can take a look in more detail at your portal and example

Done! #10962548
I ask to tag you, thank for attention.

Hey

Can anyone tell me why adding `isEnabledForEmailV3Rendering: true` to my custom coded template breaks my page:
What kind of template is this and what page is this?
